page.title: 11THE HINDU TEMPLE, PRESTON
page.content: Every Saturday I go to the{Gujarati school in the{Temple.}When I arrive I take off my shoes and go into the Temple and pray to God.Then I go to a table which has'prashad'on. Prashad is God's food.When I have eaten some of it I go out of the Temple,put on my shoes and line up in the hall ready to say a prayer before classes begin. We go to the Temple on special occa_ sions,such as'Divali',the{Festival}Of Lights.On Divali Eve we light a candle to burn all night in each room. Next morning,we dress in our best clothes and go to the Temple.We bow to the statues of our Gods,leaving gifts of money.We pray to be good and happy in our new year.We also visit friends. The rooms around the Temple are used as a{Community Centre}where engagement and wedding ceremonies are held, and also for use as a Youth Club.
